message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Broad strength in mid/small caps led by PSU infra, metals, and power. Breakout-style closes with heavy volume in SAIL, VBL, NBCC, HUDCO, HINDCOPPER, BHEL. Healthcare (LAURUS, BIOCON, LUPIN) firm; BFSI mixed; discretionary (JUBLFOOD, TRENT) constructive. Our portfolio gained on LAURUS, INDUSTOWER, BSE; BEL was soft but held its intraday low.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "SAIL", "signal": "Buy on pullback", "reason": "Wide-range bullish day; close near high with very high volume suggests continuation; metals strong across board.", "price": 139.0},
    {"symbol": "VBL", "signal": "Buy breakout > H", "reason": "Strong momentum candle from 455 to 501.7 with heavy volume; close near high favors continuation.", "price": 501.7},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Buy breakout > H", "reason": "PSU infra strength; tight day closing near high with rising volume.", "price": 116.15},
    {"symbol": "HUDCO", "signal": "Buy breakout > H", "reason": "PSU housing/infra theme strong; close near day’s high, momentum intact.", "price": 236.7},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Buy on pullback", "reason": "Copper names bid; strong close near high; look to buy minor dip toward prior demand.", "price": 349.0},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "signal": "Buy breakout > H", "reason": "Power-cap theme strength; strong close with above-average range; continuation above day’s high.", "price": 246.7},
    {"symbol": "KPITTECH", "signal": "Buy breakout > round 1200", "reason": "Recovered from intraday dip and closed strong; momentum resumes on a clean break over 1200.", "price": 1199.0},
    {"symbol": "NHPC", "signal": "Buy breakout > H", "reason": "Defensive power PSU showing steady momentum; close near high signals trend continuation.", "price": 87.09},
    {"symbol": "RVNL", "signal": "Buy breakout > H", "reason": "Rail/infra bid continues; closing strength favors a push through today's high.", "price": 334.0},
    {"symbol": "JUBLFOOD", "signal": "Buy strength on close > H", "reason": "Constructive follow-through day; demand into close; look for continuation above today’s high.", "price": 614.9}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 6942.2,
    "total_value": 26296.95,
    "holdings_count": 6,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units @ 2447.30",
      "LTF: 30 units @ 268.17",
      "BEL: 10 units @ 407.20",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units @ 961.70",
      "INDUSTOWER: 5 units @ 381.05",
      "CASH: ₹6942.20"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "PSU infra/power pack led: NBCC, HUDCO, RVNL, NHPC, NTPCGREEN showed strong closes near highs.",
    "Metals strong: SAIL and HINDCOPPER printed high-volume up days; JINDALSTEL firm.",
    "Healthcare momentum: LAURUSLABS, BIOCON, LUPIN positive; consider adds only on strength above today’s highs.",
    "Consumer/discretionary constructive: JUBLFOOD and TRENT; NYKAA stable.",
    "For Monday: prioritize breakout entries above today’s highs or buy-the-dip levels noted; size small (₹2k–₹3.5k per trade) given portfolio size.",
    "Risk: place initial stops below today’s lows for new buys; trail winners to lock gains.",
    "Avoid high ticket names (e.g., POLYCAB, MCX, ABB) due to capital constraints; focus on liquid sub-300 names for position builds.",
    "Current holdings management: LTF hold (monitor 266–270 zone), BEL hold with stop under today’s low, INDUSTOWER hold/add on dips near 378–380, LAURUSLABS trail; consider add only above 970, BSE hold while above 2410."
  ]
